column5: For the benefit for those new to the board can someone post a bit of background on Tyler and OFC's support of this cause? Cheers Ted
Everything is the same except for the date of course.....Its now the 20th  http://www.fishingfortyler.blogspot.com/
bump for another round of viewers. It is a very good cause and we need all of the help we can get to pull it off.   Art
It is Art.. and this will be the first one I miss thanks to the date being changed from normal...we hinted lots though!
